Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us, reflecting its unique features and the dedication of our team. We believe it could be an invaluable asset for you, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your needs and aspirations. Considering its extraordinary value, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $11500. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and personalized experience, ensuring your satisfaction every step of the way. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
